params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" NVL(TEMPA.PUCH_ODR_QTY, 0) - NVL(TEMPB.ACPT_QTY, 0) " +"FROM " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" SUM(A.PUCH_ODR_QTY) PUCH_ODR_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR A,M_WH B " +" WHERE " +" A.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND A.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND A.PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE < ? " +" AND A.PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP IN (1, 2) " +" AND A.WH_CD=B.WH_CD " +" AND B.MRP_FLG = '1' " +" ) TEMPA, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" SUM(B.ACPT_QTY) ACPT_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_ACPT_RSLT B " +" WHERE " +" EXISTS( " +" SELECT " +" * " +" FROM " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR A,M_WH C " +" WHERE " +" A.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND A.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND A.PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE < ? " +" AND A.PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP IN (1, 2) " +" AND A.PUCH_ODR_CD = B.PUCH_ODR_CD " +" AND A.WH_CD = C.WH_CD " +" AND C.MRP_FLG = '1' " +" ) " +" ) TEMPB"

"SELECT " +" NVL(TEMPA.PUCH_ODR_QTY, 0) - NVL(TEMPB.ACPT_QTY, 0) " +"FROM " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" SUM(A.PUCH_ODR_QTY) PUCH_ODR_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR A,M_WH B " +" WHERE " +" A.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND A.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND A.PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE >= ? " +" AND A.PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP IN (1, 2) " +" AND A.WH_CD=B.WH_CD " +" AND B.MRP_FLG = '1' " +" ) TEMPA, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" SUM(B.ACPT_QTY) ACPT_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_ACPT_RSLT B " +" WHERE " +" EXISTS( " +" SELECT " +" * " +" FROM " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR A,M_WH C " +" WHERE " +" A.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND A.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND A.PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE >= ? " +" AND A.PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP IN (1, 2) " +" AND A.PUCH_ODR_CD = B.PUCH_ODR_CD " +" AND A.WH_CD = C.WH_CD " +" AND C.MRP_FLG = '1' " +" ) " +" ) TEMPB"

"select " +" M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" as \\"Det_Parent_ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM_Parent.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"Det_Parent_ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_PS.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" as \\"Det_Comp_ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM_Comp.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"Det_Comp_ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM_Comp.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"Det_Comp_STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" M_ITEM_Comp.\\"PRODUCT_TYP\\" AS \\"Det_Comp_PRODUCT_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM_Comp.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"Det_Comp_MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM_Comp.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"Det_Comp_OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" to_char(M_PS.\\"PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') || '/' || to_char(M_PS.\\"PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"Det_Comp_PS_UNIT_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM_Comp.\\"ITEM_SPOIL\\" as \\"Det_Comp_ITEM_SPOIL\\", " +" to_char(M_PS.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"Det_EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\", " +" to_char(M_PS.\\"EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"Det_EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE\\", " +" to_char(M_PS.\\"PS_SPOIL\\", 'FM99990.0999') as \\"Det_Comp_PS_SPOIL\\", " +" M_PS.\\"CONS_TYP\\" as \\"Det_Comp_CONS_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM M_ITEM_Parent, " +" M_ITEM M_ITEM_Comp, " +" M_PS M_PS " +"where " +" M_ITEM_Parent.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" " +" and M_ITEM_Comp.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_PS.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" " +" and M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_PS.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_PS.\\"PS_EDITION\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" NVL(ONHAND_QTY1, 0) + NVL(ONHAND_QTY2, 0) ONHAND_QTY " +"FROM " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" SUM(A.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\") ONHAND_QTY1 " +" FROM " +" T_ITEM_STOCK A, " +" M_WH C " +" WHERE " +" A.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"WH_CD\\" = C.\\"WH_CD\\" " +" AND C.\\"MRP_FLG\\" = '1' " +" ), " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" SUM(B.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\") ONHAND_QTY2 " +" FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK B, " +" M_WH D " +" WHERE " +" B.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND B.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND B.\\"WH_CD\\" = D.\\"WH_CD\\" " +" AND D.\\"MRP_FLG\\" = '1' " +" )"

"SELECT " +" ROUND(ROUND(A.\\"PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\" / A.\\"PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\", 4)*?,4) NEED_QTY " +"FROM " +" M_PS A " +"WHERE " +" A.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"PS_EDITION\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" ROUND(ROUND(A.\\"PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\" / A.\\"PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\", 4)*?,4) NEED_QTY " +"FROM " +" M_PS A " +"WHERE " +" A.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"PS_EDITION\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" AS \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" AS \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" AS \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"PRODUCT_TYP\\" AS \\"PRODUCT_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_SPOIL\\" AS \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" AS \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_PS.\\"PS_EDITION\\" AS \\"PS_EDITION\\", " +" M_PS.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" AS \\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\", " +" M_PS.\\"EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE\\" AS \\"EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE\\", " +" M_PS.\\"PS_SPOIL\\" AS \\"PS_SPOIL\\", " +" M_PS.\\"CONS_TYP\\" AS \\"CONS_TYP\\", " +" M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_PS.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_PS.\\"PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\" AS \\"PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\", " +" M_PS.\\"PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\" AS \\"PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" AS \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_PS, " +" M_PLANT " +"WHERE " +" M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND M_PS.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND M_PS.\\"PS_EDITION\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.DISPLAY_NAME AS \\"PRODUCT_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM, " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND SYS_TYPE_VALUE.NAME = 'PRODUCT_TYP' " +" AND M_ITEM.PRODUCT_TYP = SYS_TYPE_VALUE.VALUE"

"SELECT " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME, " +" M_ITEM.SPEC AS SPEC, " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.DISPLAY_NAME AS PRODUCT_TYP, " +" M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT AS STOCK_UNIT, " +" M_PS.PARENT_ITEM_CD AS PARENT_ITEM_CD, " +" M_PS.COMP_ITEM_CD AS COMP_ITEM_CD, " +" M_PS.PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR AS PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR, " +" M_PS.PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR AS PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR " +"FROM " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_PS, " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"WHERE " +" M_PS.COMP_ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" AND SYS_TYPE_VALUE.NAME = 'PRODUCT_TYP' " +" AND M_ITEM.PRODUCT_TYP = SYS_TYPE_VALUE.VALUE " +" AND M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND M_PS.PARENT_ITEM_CD = ?"

"SELECT " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME, " +" M_ITEM.SPEC AS SPEC, " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.DISPLAY_NAME AS PRODUCT_TYP, " +" M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT AS STOCK_UNIT, " +" M_PS.PARENT_ITEM_CD AS PARENT_ITEM_CD, " +" M_PS.COMP_ITEM_CD AS COMP_ITEM_CD, " +" M_PS.PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR AS PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR, " +" M_PS.PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR AS PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR " +"FROM " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_PS, " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"WHERE " +" M_PS.PARENT_ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" AND SYS_TYPE_VALUE.NAME = 'PRODUCT_TYP' " +" AND M_ITEM.PRODUCT_TYP = SYS_TYPE_VALUE.VALUE " +" AND M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND M_PS.COMP_ITEM_CD = ?"

"select " +" M_ITEM.SPEC AS SPEC, " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.DISPLAY_NAME AS PRODUCT_TYP, " +" M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT AS STOCK_UNIT, " +" M_PS.PARENT_ITEM_CD AS PARENT_ITEM_CD, " +" M_PS.COMP_ITEM_CD AS COMP_ITEM_CD, " +" M_PS.PS_EDITION AS PS_EDITION, " +" M_PS.PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR AS PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR, " +" M_PS.PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR AS PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR, " +" X.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"PARENT_ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"COMP_ITEM_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_PS, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_ITEM X, " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"where " +" M_PS.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" AND SYS_TYPE_VALUE.NAME = 'PRODUCT_TYP' " +" AND M_ITEM.PRODUCT_TYP = SYS_TYPE_VALUE.VALUE " +" and M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" = X.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_PS.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_PS.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?) " +" and M_PS.\\"EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE\\" >= TO_DATE(?)"
